definition: rosacea (dermatological condition of the face and nose)/brandy nose

sentences.english: The air reeked of distillers' grains mixed in the pig feed.
sentences.chinese: 空气中飘荡着猪饲料中酒糟冒出的不锈钢管味道。

sentences.english: One said, one side more red vinasse nose.
sentences.chinese: 一面说，一面酒糟鼻子就更红了。

sentences.english: We came across some cases of moldy brewery mash poisoning in equine.
sentences.chinese: 在临诊实践中，接触到马属动物的霉变酒糟中毒病例。

sentences.english: This food therapy for rosacea papules period.
sentences.chinese: 此食疗法适用于酒糟鼻丘疹期。

sentences.english: Daqu production by the addition of fresh distiller's grains could save grains and reduce production cost.
sentences.chinese: 利用添加鲜酒糟生产大曲可节约粮食，降低成本。

sentences.english: Netlon mesh can also be used as a stillage separator.
sentences.chinese: 奈特龙网也可用于酒糟作为分隔。

sentences.english: This paper expounded a new technology, which can effectively reduce the content of rough fibre.
sentences.chinese: 该文提出了一种降低白酒糟粗纤维含量的新工艺。

sentences.english: Practices proof, vinasse and distillery slops close recycling all reuse is practicable.
sentences.chinese: 实践证明，酒糟废液闭路循环全回用是可行的。

sentences.english: Distillers' grains can be used as a good raw material for livestock feed production.
sentences.chinese: 废酒糟可作为生产家畜饲料的一种很好的原料。

sentences.english: The rhinologists say that brandy nose can be treated.
sentences.chinese: 鼻科专家表示酒糟鼻子是能治好的。

sentences.english: Camphor oil has recently been evaluated for its effectiveness in treating demodicoses that often occur with rosacea.
sentences.chinese: 樟脑油对常常出现在酒糟鼻中螨虫治疗有效。

sentences.english: Besides, yellow rice wine lees contained abundant nutrient substances, which should be full used.
sentences.chinese: 黄酒糟中有丰富的营养，应充分开发利用。

definition: name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
"yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
okara (i.e. soy pulp, a by-product of making soymilk or tofu)
